text: 13.22: 1 Sml 13.14; 15.23-26; 16.12-13; 2 Sml 2.4; Sng 89.20; Hos 13.11Ana mbe garav kim, Fhe Bakɨme, ana vharav Devit ndi fagim, ana mben ŋgui gari guman pan ki. Ana Devit ndi fav, ana bun mbe nzuav khaŋ mbe nzuai, ‘Gu Zesin kama Devit gangiap, na ndava vhee gu guigira ana vuzvugi. Ana na vuzvugi, ana nta zɨn ŋgɨrga.’
